long_description: The slim Eagle Creek Tailfeather Waistpack in size small has security features and great organization for all the things you need on a day spent exploring. Main compartment has lockable zippers to deter pickpockets. Front zippered, fleece-lined pocket protects a phone or music player. Inner mesh zip pocket and key fob. External zip secondary compartment. Padded, breathable-mesh back panel adds comfort. Adjustable strap and top grab handle. Eagle Creek Tailfeather Waistpack has reflective accents so you're more safely visible in low light.
short_description: The slim Eagle Creek Tailfeather Waistpack in size small has security features and great organization for all the things you need on a day spent exploring.
